basics.name: Bruno Sosin
basics.label: Power Platform Consultant, Power Bi, Power Automate
basics.summary: Passionate about technology and travel, in my first job 10 years ago as a branch manager, I worked with many freelancers. This experience refined my vision of work and connected it with my lifelong passions. With this in mind, I created websites and digital marketing campaigns that led me to decide to professionalize in 2019 and to pursue training in web development.

work.summary: Studies, improvement, and evolution of existing processes and information systems...
highlights: Refactoring of commercial data extraction processes through ETL Dataflows to facilitate data access to various departments.
Creation of Power Bi dashboards for sales, collections, and purchases
Creation of a digitization and OCR process linked to an algorithm that classifies invoices and automatically sends them to clients on scheduled dates
Mentoring and training of a junior developer on the Power Platform suite

work.summary: Integration and enrichment of product data to prepare for the launch of an e-commerce...
highlights: Automation of business procedures and processes with Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power Shell scripts
Creation of product data enrichment scripts in nodeJS via Puppeteer
Sorting and enriching data for more than 60,000 product references
Supervision and progress monitoring of the chosen e-commerce provider...
Submission of over 50 bug reports rated as 'useful'

work.summary: Reception and processing of customer calls...
highlights: Use of Salesforce for call tracking and processing
Organization of a Baltic Sea cruise seminar gathering more than 120 professionals...
Management of Google Ads and Facebook Ads marketing campaigns...
Organization of 4 international trips with more than 30 participants

work.summary: Management of all aspects of a commercial branch...
highlights: Organization of an event gathering more than 300 people...
Completion of comprehensive regional sales statistical reports...

education.studyType: Professional title in web and mobile web development

skills.name: Business Intelligence, Low Code, and RPA
